Package com.dua3.utility.application.imp

Class DarkModeDetectorBase

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.application.imp.DarkModeDetectorBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
DarkModeDetector
Direct Known Subclasses:
DarkModeDetectorUnsupported
public abstract class DarkModeDetectorBase extends Object implements DarkModeDetector
An abstract base class for detecting and handling dark mode status. This class provides a foundational implementation of the DarkModeDetector interface, managing listeners and notifying them of dark mode state changes.

Subclasses should implement the specific logic for detecting dark mode and invoking onChangeDetected(boolean) when a change is detected.

The class handles: - Adding and removing listeners for dark mode state changes. - Logging state changes and listener actions.

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public final void addListener(Consumer<Boolean> listener)
      Adds a listener for dark mode state changes. The listener is a Consumer that accepts a Boolean value representing the dark mode state. A value of true indicates that dark mode is enabled, and false indicates that it is disabled.
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface DarkModeDetector
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be notified of dark mode state changes; cannot be null

    • removeListener

      public final void removeListener(Consumer<Boolean> listener)
      Removes a previously added listener for dark mode state changes. If the specified listener is not present in the list, no action is taken.
      Specified by:
      removeListener in interface DarkModeDetector
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be removed; must not be null

    • onChangeDetected

      protected final void onChangeDetected(boolean darkMode)
      Notifies all registered listeners of a detected change in the dark mode status.
      Parameters:
      darkMode - a boolean indicating the current state of dark mode; true if dark mode is enabled, false otherwise

    • monitorSystemChanges

      protected abstract void monitorSystemChanges(boolean enable)
      Monitors system changes for dark mode state. This method is invoked to enable or disable the monitoring of system-level events that indicate a change in dark mode status.

      Subclasses must implement this method to define the specific behavior for starting or stopping the monitoring functionality.

      Parameters:
      enable - true enables and false disables monitoring
